name: Repsah
description:
A metroidvania project im working on little by little

Few enemies, few hidden stuff, interactable enviroment pieces, A BOSS FIGHT!
Only 2 levels: 1st and BossLevel

Controlls:
Arrows - movement
Q - attack (u can attack upwards holding up arrow and downwards while in midair and holding down arrow)

TIPS:
Downwards attack is REALLY usefull!!! (u need it to use it to go to BossLevel)
U can and u should interact with enviroment pieces!
Look at WALLS!!!

Feature powerups and unimplemented stuff:
* press "1" to  toggle Dash-on/off (might need to press "1" few times to work) - SHIFT to DASH
* press "2" to toggle DoubleJump-on/off (might need to press "2" few times to work)
* press Z or X to toggle yeti to attack (dont toggle both at once)

R- restarts level
L - Loads back destroyed secrets (u need to restart level after that to load it)

ANY FEEDBACK WILL BE APRITIATED!!!

ENJOY!!!






**
Features im working on:
- Landmarks and pointers that will hint u the direction of important objectives like powerups, bosses, locations etc.
- Range attacks (powers)
- Menu and animated UI
- Powerups
- Story
